con:call.name: BoardOffLoadPassengers Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.CheckIn.Request" xmlns:arr="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:BoardOffLoadPassengers>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:BoardOffLoadPassengersRequest>\r <rad:SecurityGUID>?</rad:SecurityGUID>\r <rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad:CarrierCode>\r <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>?</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCode>\r </rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:ClientIPAddress>?</rad:ClientIPAddress>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <rad:HistoricUserName>?</rad:HistoricUserName>\r <rad1:ActionType>?</rad1:ActionType>\r <rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad:SeriesNumber>?</rad:SeriesNumber>\r <rad:ConfirmationNumber>?</rad:ConfirmationNumber>\r </rad1:ReservationInfo>\r <rad1:Origin>?</rad1:Origin>\r <rad1:FlightNumber>?</rad1:FlightNumber>\r <rad1:DepartureDate>?</rad1:DepartureDate>\r <rad1:BoardingPassNumbers>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <arr:int>?</arr:int>\r </rad1:BoardingPassNumbers>\r </tem:BoardOffLoadPassengersRequest>\r </tem:BoardOffLoadPassengers>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
